text: Mauro Alessio Savastano (16 April 1997) is a Dutch professional footballer who currently plays for Jong AZ as a defender. ==Club career== Savastano is a youth exponent from AFC Ajax. He made his professional debut at Jong Ajax on 16 March 2015 in an Eerste Divisie game against Fortuna Sittard replacing Terry Lartey Sanniez at half-time in a 3–0 home win. ==Personal life== Born in the Netherlands, Savastano is of Italian descent. ==References== Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Zaanstad Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Dutch footballers Category:Dutch people of Italian descent Category:AFC Ajax players Category:Jong Ajax players Category:Eerste Divisie players
title: Mauro Savastano
